IP_SYN_0_style_9:
PREOPERATIVE DIAGNOSIS: Right lower lobe segmental blockade.
PROCEDURE: Flexible bronchoscopy with airway clearance.
DETAILS: After obtaining consent, the scope was introduced. We observed diffuse inflammation and heavy secretions. We extracted the mucous plugs via suction from both the right and left sides. We also sampled the RLL via lavage. No masses were visualized. The patient withstood the procedure well.
